message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product at a special price of $11000. I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm really interested, but $11000 is a bit above my budget.  How about $10500?  That's the highest I can go at this time.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a bit more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $10800?
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $10800 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10600.  This would be a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $10600. How about we take it up to $10900? That's as close as I can get for now.
